default_background.name: Default Background
default_background.desc: Default dark-themed background in your eternal possession, and originally designed as a prototype by Kaluub.

light_background.name: Light Background
light_background.desc: That's an alternative light version of the default background. Be careful with your screen's brightness settings. Same as its predecessor — designed as a prototype by Kaluub.

clash_background.name: Clash Background
clash_background.desc: Clash-themed background following its colour palette and design, the first version of its kind. Available for any of the Clash clan's followers. Design by Aldople.

harmony_background.name: Harmony Background
harmony_background.desc: Harmony-themed background following its colour palette and design, the first version of its kind. Available for any of the Harmony clan's followers. Design by Aldople.

clash_mascot_background.name: Clash Mascot Background
clash_mascot_background.desc: That's an upgraded version of the Clash background, now also featuring its original mascot! Design by Aldople.

harmony_mascot_background.name: Harmony Mascot Background
harmony_mascot_background.desc: That's an upgraded version of the Harmony background, now also featuring its original mascot! Design by Aldople.

clash_harmony_background.name: Clash & Harmony Background
clash_harmony_background.desc: A truly all-powerful collaboration of Clash & Harmony gets shown by this background. Design by Aldople.

clash_one_year_anniversary_background.name: Clash 1 Year Anniversary Background
clash_one_year_anniversary_background.desc: Festive background for celebration and appreciation of the Clash clan's first anniversary! Design by Aldople.

pixel_worlds_background.name: Pixel Worlds Background
pixel_worlds_background.desc: Pixel Worlds! That's what this background is all about. Design by Aldople.

pixel_background.name: Pixelated Background
pixel_background.desc: Pixels! Pixels everywhere! A must-have for anyone appreciating them. This background is alternatively known as "Pixel Background", and we definitely didn't have to change its name because of similarities with another one... Design by Aldople.

landscape_background.name: Landscape Background
landscape_background.desc: Who wouldn't want to have landscape as the background of their profile card? Design by Aldople.

citrina_background.name: Citrina's Background
citrina_background.desc: Custom background for Citrina, but even if you aren't them — it's solvable with a purchase from the !shop. Features everyone's favourite fruit — lemon! Design by Aldople.

quqqo_background.name: Ghustie's Background
quqqo_background.desc: Custom background for Ghustie, but even if you aren't them — it's solvable with a purchase from the !shop. Created by the one and only. Design by Ghustie.

aldople_background.name: Aldople's Background
aldople_background.desc: Custom background for Aldople, but even if you aren't them — it's solvable with a purchase from the !shop. It's a piece of Ivan Marchuk's art titled Landscape, 1980. Design by the same person.

sieggy_background.name: Sieggy's Background
sieggy_background.desc: Custom background for Sieggy, but even if you aren't them — it's solvable with a purchase from the !shop. Sieggy & The Second Heart-themed! Design by Aldople.

kaluub_background.name: Kaluub's Background
kaluub_background.desc: Custom background for Kaluub, but even if you aren't them — it's solvable with a purchase from the !shop. Kaluub recommends. Design by Aldople.

append_background.name: Append's Background
append_background.desc: Custom background for Append, but even if you aren't them — it's solvable with a purchase from the !shop. It's a Takagi-san! Design by Aldople.

zithi_background.name: Zithi's Background
zithi_background.desc: Custom background for Zithi, but even if you aren't them — it's solvable with a purchase from the !shop. Maeve? Design by Aldople.

twins_background.name: Twins' Background
twins_background.desc: Custom background for Bassem & Bassel, but even if you aren't them — it's solvable with a purchase from the !shop. Twin cats for twins. Design by Aldople.

space_background.name: Space Background
space_background.desc: Space to fill up the blank space of your profile card. Design by Aldople.

ancient_clash_background.name: Ancient Clash Background
ancient_clash_background.desc: Lost, but not forgotten, aged variation of Clash! Design by Aldople.

ancient_harmony_background.name: Ancient Harmony Background
ancient_harmony_background.desc: Lost, but not forgotten, aged variation of Harmony! Design by Aldople.

spring_background.name: Spring Background
spring_background.desc: One of the four seasonal backgrounds. Capture spring with this one! Design by Aldople.

summer_background.name: Summer Background
summer_background.desc: One of the four seasonal backgrounds. Capture summer with this one! Design by Aldople.

autumn_background.name: Autumn Background
autumn_background.desc: One of the four seasonal backgrounds. Capture autumn with this one! Design by Aldople.

winter_background.name: Winter Background
winter_background.desc: One of the four seasonal backgrounds. Capture winter with this one! Design by Aldople.

golden_background.name: Golden Background
golden_background.desc: You went through quite a lot to get this. An ever-increasing chance. But how do you get the frame? Designed by Kaluub.

melting_ice_cream_background.name: Melting Ice Cream Background
melting_ice_cream_background.desc: Perhaps the most delicious background available. Wouldn't want to try it myself, though. Designed by SpicyBee.

default_frame.name: Default Frame
default_frame.desc: Default dark-themed frame in your eternal possession, and originally designed as a prototype by Kaluub.

golden_frame.name: Golden Frame
golden_frame.desc: The true treasure! There's only a 0.25% chance to get this one, and originally designed as an easter egg by Kaluub.

clash_frame.name: Clash Frame
clash_frame.desc: Clash-themed frame following its colour palette and design, the first version of its kind. Available for any of the Clash clan's followers. Design by Aldople.

harmony_frame.name: Harmony Frame
harmony_frame.desc: Harmony-themed frame following its colour palette and design, the first version of its kind. Available for any of the Harmony clan's followers. Design by Aldople.

clash_harmony_frame.name: Clash & Harmony Frame
clash_harmony_frame.desc: A truly all-powerful collaboration of Clash & Harmony gets shown by this frame. Design by Aldople.

clash_one_year_anniversary_frame.name: Clash 1 Year Anniversary Frame
clash_one_year_anniversary_frame.desc: Festive frame for celebration and appreciation of the Clash clan's first anniversary! Design by Aldople.

pixel_worlds_frame.name: Pixel Worlds Frame
pixel_worlds_frame.desc: Pixel Worlds! That's what this frame is all about. Design by Aldople.

pixel_frame.name: Pixelated Frame
pixel_frame.desc: Pixels! Pixels everywhere! A must-have for anyone appreciating them. This frame is alternatively known as "Pixel Frame", and we definitely didn't have to change its name because of similarities with another one... Design by Aldople.

clouds_frame.name: Clouds Frame
clouds_frame.desc: It's getting cloudy around here. Design by Aldople.

citrina_frame.name: Citrina's Frame
citrina_frame.desc: Custom frame for Citrina, but even if you aren't them — it's solvable with a purchase from the !shop. Features everyone's favourite fruit — lemon! Design by Aldople.

quqqo_frame.name: Ghustie's Frame
quqqo_frame.desc: Custom frame for Ghustie, but even if you aren't them — it's solvable with a purchase from the !shop. It's haunted! Design by Aldople.

aldople_frame.name: Aldople's Frame
aldople_frame.desc: Custom frame for Aldople, but even if you aren't them — it's solvable with a purchase from the !shop. It's nothing, or is it? Designed by nobody.

sieggy_frame.name: Sieggy's Frame
sieggy_frame.desc: Custom frame for Sieggy, but even if you aren't them — it's solvable with a purchase from the !shop. Executioner's axes! Design by Aldople.

kaluub_frame.name: Kaluub's Frame
kaluub_frame.desc: Custom frame for Kaluub, but even if you aren't them — it's solvable with a purchase from the !shop. Kaluub recommends. Design by Aldople.

append_frame.name: Append's Frame
append_frame.desc: Custom frame for Append, but even if you aren't them — it's solvable with a purchase from the !shop. As beautiful as the sky. Design by Aldople.

zithi_frame.name: Zithi's Frame
zithi_frame.desc: Custom frame for Zithi, but even if you aren't them — it's solvable with a purchase from the !shop. No Maeve here. Design by Aldople.

twins_frame.name: Twins' Frame
twins_frame.desc: Custom frame for Bassem & Bassel, but even if you aren't them — it's solvable with a purchase from the !shop. Twin cats for twins. Design by Aldople.

space_frame.name: Space Frame
space_frame.desc: Space to fill up the blank space of your profile card. Design by Aldople.

ancient_clash_frame.name: Ancient Clash Frame
ancient_clash_frame.desc: Lost, but not forgotten, aged variation of Clash! Design by Aldople.

ancient_harmony_frame.name: Ancient Harmony Frame
ancient_harmony_frame.desc: Lost, but not forgotten, aged variation of Harmony! Design by Aldople.

spring_frame.name: Spring Frame
spring_frame.desc: One of the four seasonal frames. Capture spring with this one! Design by Aldople.

summer_frame.name: Summer Frame
summer_frame.desc: One of the four seasonal frames. Capture summer with this one! Design by Aldople.

autumn_frame.name: Autumn Frame
autumn_frame.desc: One of the four seasonal frames. Capture autumn with this one! Design by Aldople.
